scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two figures kneeling in prayer, facing a large, blue, silhouetted figure radiating golden rays. The figures are dressed in pink robes and have their hands clasped. Above and around the central blue figure, curved bands of text in Latin are visible. The background is a vibrant blue, suggesting a celestial or divine setting, with a patch of green representing the earth or a grassy area at the bottom. The overall composition is framed by decorative borders, with orange and green elements.
